content: is there such a thing as  Scrabble-top (coffee) table?

Yes, there are coffee tables available that have a built-in Scrabble board on the tabletop. These tables typically have a removable glass or wooden top, allowing you to play Scrabble directly on the surface. Some models may even come with built-in storage compartments for storing the tiles and other game pieces. You can find these Scrabble-top coffee tables in furniture stores or online retailers that specialize in board games or unique furniture designs.
